descripcion: Due to insecure library loading in the Eaton UPS Companion software executable, an attacker with access to the software package could perform arbitrary code execution . This security issue has been fixed in the latest version of EUC which is available on the Eaton download center. 26/12/2025 26/12/2025 Vector CVSS:3.1 CVSS:3.1/AV:L/AC:H/PR:L/UI:N/S:C/C:H/I:H/A:H Gravedad 3.1 (CVSS 3.1 Base Score) 7.80 Gravedad 3.1 Txt Gravedad 3.1 (CVSS 3.1 Base Score) HIGH

Improper quotation in search paths in the Eaton UPS Companion software installer could lead to arbitrary code execution of an attacker with the access to the file system.
